main event: A red ball of fire was sighted in Freeport, Texas on November 3, 1957.
interesting points: The object was observed for 2 minutes as it moved low, gained altitude, and then disappeared before reappearing at a greater height., The sighting was made by a civilian directly under an airway., The witness did not hear any audible sound from the object., There were comments suggesting that the object might have been an aircraft or a balloon., The reliability of the observer was considered unknown, but coast guard personnel's reliability was considered excellent.
